com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context

Interface ContextService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContextFactory

    public interface ContextService

    Provides access to an InfinitumContext singleton. This is typically not used directly, rather the implementation ContextFactory is used.

    Version:
    1.0 05/18/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InfinitumContext configure(Context context, int configId)
      Configures Infinitum with the specified configuration file.
      InfinitumContext getContext()
      Retrieves the InfinitumContext singleton.
      PersistencePolicy getPersistencePolicy()
      Retrieves the configured PersistencePolicy.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        InfinitumContext configure(Context context,
                         int configId)
                           throws InfinitumConfigurationException
        Configures Infinitum with the specified configuration file. Configuration file must be named infinitum.cfg.xml. This method must be called before attempting to retrieve an InfinitumContext.
        Parameters:
        context - the calling Context
        configId - the resource ID for the XML config file
        Returns:
        configured InfinitumContext
        Throws:
        InfinitumConfigurationException - if the configuration file could not be found or if the file could not be parsed

      • getContext

        InfinitumContext getContext()
                            throws InfinitumConfigurationException
        Retrieves the InfinitumContext singleton. ContextFactory.configure(Context, int) must be called before using this method. Otherwise, an InfinitumConfigurationException will be thrown.
        Returns:
        the InfinitumContext singleton
        Throws:
        InfinitumConfigurationException - if configure was not called

      • getPersistencePolicy

        PersistencePolicy getPersistencePolicy()
        Retrieves the configured PersistencePolicy.
        Returns:
        PersistencePolicy
